turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good afternoon, how is everything going?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Great! How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am doing relatively well and fine.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What kind of person are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, I believe that overall I am good person with a great drive to do as much for people in general.  Many have said that I am a giving and kind person.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What kind good things do you do for people?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, I basically help individuals who are closest to me by helping the elderly with very tasks locally.  I also have a tendency to help children around my neighbor by mentoring some.  I also help with my local congregation by a Godly person as well.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You sound like a very nice and charitable individual. It is a pleasure to meet you!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, thank I appreciate your kindness.  I try to do right by people.  I believe in the golden rule do unto others as you have them do unto you.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is a very virtuous code to live by. I admire your morality.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you for your kindness.  I really appreciate your kind words.  It is nice to talk with you.  That brings me to one of the reasons why I am communicating with you today.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I appreciate your kindness as well. What is your purpose?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, I believe in our children.  That is reason why I am a part of a cause to help children earth wide.  We are asking for any kind of monetary donation that you may have to help with the cause.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I believe that helping children is a noble cause. How would my donation help these children?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, your donation would help on so many levels.  Your donation will help to the overall betterment, improved health, education, and safety of many of these children who come from a developing country.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Why should I help these children? Are they not already being helped?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, let me say this.  The children in these countries would like to have additional money provided because still in our modern day, it is still not enough to help.  That is one of the reasons why we are asking for more help.  There are many stories of children who have died from hunger but additional donations would be able to help to quell some of these isolated instances.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is very compelling. How much of a donation are you asking for?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, any amount that you would like to offer would be greatly appreciated.  We like individuals to give from a joyful heart.  So whatever amount that you offer would be greatly appreciated and highly respected by our organization, the Save the Children fund.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have donated a lot this year to charity but I am able to spare $1 if it means helping children.
